sentences.sentence: The death toll from the earthquake that's devastated Turkey and Syria has surpassed 12,000 as rescuers desperately search for survivors. The worst predictions about the earthquake that shook Syria and Turkey on Monday morning have been confirmed. The death toll in the two countries has surpassed 12,000 according to the latest official figures. The UN believes the final numbers may exceed 20,000. Rescue teams from around the world continue searching for survivors.

These and other rescues fuel hope for a grieving country with thousands of homes destroyed and an uncertain number of people still trapped inside.
